messages.message: Clear all caches? This may temporarily slow down the site.
messages.translation: Clear all caches? This may temporarily slow down the site.

messages.message: Redis connection failed. Using in-memory cache as fallback. Check your Redis configuration.
messages.translation: Redis connection failed. Using in-memory cache as fallback. Check your Redis configuration.

messages.message: Using Redis for distributed caching, enabling cache sharing across multiple application instances. Ideal for production deployments.
messages.translation: Using Redis for distributed caching, enabling cache sharing across multiple application instances. Ideal for production deployments.

messages.message: Using local in-memory caching. Fast but not shared between application instances. Set OCMS_REDIS_URL to enable Redis.
messages.translation: Using local in-memory caching. Fast but not shared between application instances. Set OCMS_REDIS_URL to enable Redis.

messages.message: Caches site-wide configuration values (site name, description, logo, etc.). Automatically invalidated when configuration is updated.
messages.translation: Caches site-wide configuration values (site name, description, logo, etc.). Automatically invalidated when configuration is updated.

messages.message: Caches the generated sitemap.xml. Regenerated hourly or when content changes. Reduces database queries for large sites.
messages.translation: Caches the generated sitemap.xml. Regenerated hourly or when content changes. Reduces database queries for large sites.

messages.message: Caches navigation menus and language configurations for fast frontend rendering. Automatically invalidated when updated.
messages.translation: Caches navigation menus and language configurations for fast frontend rendering. Automatically invalidated when updated.

messages.message: Using Redis for distributed caching, enabling cache sharing across multiple application instances. Ideal for production deployments.
messages.translation: Using Redis for distributed caching, enabling cache sharing across multiple application instances. Ideal for production deployments.

messages.message: Using local in-memory caching. Fast but not shared between application instances. Set OCMS_REDIS_URL to enable Redis.
messages.translation: Using local in-memory caching. Fast but not shared between application instances. Set OCMS_REDIS_URL to enable Redis.

messages.message: Caches site-wide configuration values (site name, description, logo, etc.). Automatically invalidated when configuration is updated.

messages.translation: Caches navigation menus and language configurations for fast frontend rendering. Automatically invalidated when updated.

messages.message: Export your site content as JSON
messages.translation: Export your site content as JSON

messages.message: Export all pages with their content, SEO settings, and translations
messages.translation: Export all pages with their content, SEO settings, and translations

messages.message: Include form submission data (may contain sensitive information)
messages.translation: Include form submission data (may contain sensitive information)

messages.message: The export will generate a JSON file containing all selected content. Media files are not included in the export - only their metadata. Use this export for backup purposes or to migrate content to another oCMS instance.
messages.translation: The export will generate a JSON file containing all selected content. Media files are not included in the export - only their metadata. Use this export for backup purposes or to migrate content to another oCMS instance.

messages.message: Include actual media files in the export (creates a ZIP archive)
messages.translation: Include actual media files in the export (creates a ZIP archive)

messages.message: The export will create a ZIP archive containing both the JSON data and all media files. This may take longer and produce a larger file.
messages.translation: The export will create a ZIP archive containing both the JSON data and all media files. This may take longer and produce a larger file.

messages.message: Import content from a JSON or ZIP file
messages.translation: Import content from a JSON or ZIP file

messages.message: Drop a file here or click to browse
messages.translation: Drop a file here or click to browse

messages.message: Only .json files exported from oCMS are supported
messages.translation: Only .json files exported from oCMS are supported

messages.message: Supports JSON files or ZIP archives with media exported from oCMS
messages.translation: Supports JSON files or ZIP archives with media exported from oCMS

messages.message: Import content from a JSON or ZIP file previously exported from oCMS. You can select what to import and how to handle conflicts with existing content.
messages.translation: Import content from a JSON or ZIP file previously exported from oCMS. You can select what to import and how to handle conflicts with existing content.

messages.message: Copy media files from the ZIP archive to the uploads directory
messages.translation: Copy media files from the ZIP archive to the uploads directory

messages.translation: Import pages with their content and SEO settings
